summary: A woman's consuming love forces her to bear the clone of her dead beloved. From his infancy to manhood, she faces the unavoidable complexities of her controversial decision.
cast: Eva Green|Matt Smith|Lesley Manville|Peter Wight|István Lénárt|Hannah Murray|Ruby O. Fee|Tristan Christopher|Jesse Hoffmann|Natalia Tena|Ella Smith|Wunmi Mosaku|Alexander Goeller|Adrian Wahlen|Gina Stiebitz|Amanda Lawrence|Jennifer Lim|Tina Engel|Lukas Hawkins|Lukas Sweetwood|Fabian Hundertmark|Péter Erik Tóth|Jerun Minguell Agundez|Anna-Zsófia Drávucz|Kata Petra Kiss|Noah Hedges
keywords: incest rape|love|mother son sex|women's rights|woman's freedom
title: Womb
